If you want a personified version of a mouse navigating a cage maze in a sadistic teenager's bedroom, this is the game for you.

This game is such a success. What Valve aimed for, they have achieved. Following the story of Chell, a test subject in Aperture Science, you are guided through puzzle chambers with only a robotic female voice ( I don't want to give spoilers ), your trusty Portal gun, and your wits. But something seems amiss in the centre, as you soon find out. 

A great experience, challenging puzzles and an immersive story. A must-buy.
Cooles Spiel. Ist zwar kurz (ca. 4 st.), aber Nett.

A very easy playthrough that allows you to test your intuitiveness and quick thinking in multiple puzzles. The game to me is a must own for everyone, I had a lot of fun playing it. The only hard part to me would be to get gold on all the puzzles.

Jogo muito bom, a Valve sempre inova em seus jogos, e com portal não foi diferente. Apesar de antigo, e não ter todos os recursos gráficos dos jogos atuais, ele é tem um visual simples e característico. O único defeito é quanto a sua duração, o jogo tem no máximo, por mais tapado que você seja 2hs

Portal is a game about going around through test chambers with a portal gun (thanks, captain!). This game is awesome. The story is amazing for a game as little as this, the graphics are not that bad for a game released in 2007 and the sound effect are good. The music is discreet, but really nice. The use of the Portal Gun is incredibly well tought and won't let you get off your computer. The only downside, is that this game is extremely short. I've finished the main story in 3 hours which is pretty not that much. At least, the advanced test chambers, the challenges and the achievements can add more playtime. I would say that Portal is an excellent game, there's pretty much no reason to not buy it, it's a classic!
The Portal series is one of my Favorites. Fantastic game mechanics interwoven with a great, and fun, story.
Me parece un excelente juego,voy casi a la mitad del juego y me atrevo a decir que es mejor que cualquier Call of duty (Ya se que no son del mismo genero) Lo recomiendo (y)

An interesting twist on fps. No weapon just a portal gun. And you have to think which keeps your mind active and at times it can be frustrating. There were times when I was overthinking a puzzle. I tend to overlook the obvious.

Valve always seem to think outside the box for FPS's. Portal is a prime example of that. Thrust into a indoor testing facility setting, you begin the game waiting and wondering what to do. The moment the first ever blue portal appears, you KNOW it's going to be a unique experience, which it certainly is. Playing with the mechanics of the portals is a seriously original concept and a breath of fresh air in gaming, not to mention that playing with momentum and physics can be really good fun and put to good use, particularly in the later stages of the game. When people talk about Portal, they'll probably talk about GlaDos, the AI character that guides you and how entertaining she is. Sure, she has her funny lines but she never really seemed as good as what I'd heard about her. Also, this game is pretty short to be honest. It's easy to beat it in a day and the challenges on the side don't extend it too much unless you're a die-hard completionist, in my opinion. However, if you look past the length, Portal is a great game to keep your attention for a while and has some genuinely great moments and gameplay. If you're not interested in the challenges, pick it up during a sale. If you're more of a completionist, pick it up at any time you want. 8/10 (Great)
Great Game

best 4 hour game you will ever see

1a caracteristico do jogo, Portal é um jogo muito, mas muito rápido. Sim, o gameplay dele da para ser feito em 1 dia ou até em 1/3 dia tranquilamente se você tiver habilidade em raciocínio lógico.
Mas não quer dizer que você não encontrará desafios, e desafios muito inteligentes dentro do jogo.
Sabe aquele game que serve para limpar a cabeça entre 2 jogos super viciantes?! É assim que eu considerei Portal, é um jogo que te tira do seu mundo e te obriga a entrar na cabeça da fisica do gameplay para conseguir passar das fases.
Óbviamente por seu curto periodo de tempo, não é algo para ser glorificado ao extremo, pois no final te deixa com aquele gostinho de "quero mais". 
Mas é um jogo barato e vale o que é pago se você gosta de puzzles. É muito bonito e possui uma fisica ótima.
Molto più di un semplice puzzle game.
